title: League client takes too long to start
body: When I click the league icon to open the client, the League of Legends logo appears on the desktop (OSX Sierra) and then stays there. The client doesn't pop up. Opened Activity Monitor and shows UserKernel is not responding. I usually have to force quit it and then start it again multiple times before the client finally appears. Sometimes, I just let the logo stay there and then after like 2-3 minutes, the client window appears. But, UseKernel is always not responding. Reinstalled the game 4 times now but it keeps doing it. I started using the updated client but same issue.

replies.body:
It certainly sounds like there is either a permissions issue or a connection inconsistency happening. I'd like you to ensure your local network settings are in good standing by working through our [connection guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#section-mac)

If you still encounter this issue after taking those steps, let me know.
